Text.Page:
I have another theory: the protective barrier once shielding Seeliewood was maintained by faeriesâ€”faeries who went mad and stopped working their fey magic.

I need the faeries' relics so I can re-energize the protective barrier. It'll be the perfect research! Plus, it'll keep any more dracoloths from dropping in.

If you can find and collect a few abandoned faerie relics, I'm sure I can get something working from them.

Excellent! Now I take this device and apply a manacache...

Oh right. I'm done with you now, .
That's not enough. Are you trying to sabotage my chance for fame?
